messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the goal for the Keeper not to do before nightfall?
They don’t want to harm their captives before nightfall if they can help it.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can investigators do to work themselves free if they are captive?
They can make Hard DEX rolls, whether they try to free their own bonds or help another investigator.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the investigators fail a Hard DEX roll to free themselves?
The consequence of failure is attracting the servants’ attention.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can investigators do if they are trying to help another investigator to free themselves?
They can make Hard DEX rolls, whether they try to free their own bonds or help another investigator.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the consequence of failure on a Hard DEX roll to free oneself from bonds?
Attracting the servants' attention.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can investigators do if they are louder than a whisper while speaking?
A servant in the next room can hear everything they say.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the motivation of Turner and his gang if the prisoners break free?
They won’t have any hesitation using force to subdue them.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the undead servants if the investigators escape from the site?
They will go to the death.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the prisoners break free during daylight?
They won’t have any hesitation using force to subdue them.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the investigators if they break free?
They are taken down to the lake when night falls to be converted to undying servants.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the investigators if they don't break free?
They are taken down to the lake when night falls to be converted to undying servants.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What will happen to the prisoners if they break free into daylight?
They will be pursued to the death by the investigators.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the investigators if they break free into daylight?
They are hunted to the death by the investigators.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where do the investigators are taken if they don’t break free?
To the lake.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is heard by the investigators from within the pit?
The sound of working.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is operated by the workers, assisted by Turner and his crew, after sunset?
A pulley system to pull out a pale blue-colored crystal.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the workers' actions at night?
The workers are operating the pulley to pull out a pale blue-colored crystal.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the crystal's light if the investigators don't intervene?
The crystal shines with a bright blue light that becomes painful to watch after a few seconds.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Gla'aki after it drains the power from the crystal?
Gla'aki thrashes in the water and eventually sinks slowly beneath the waves.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the undead servants after the ritual?
The undead servants return to the dig site, full of pleasure for having fulfilled the dreams of their god.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the light after a flash?
It dies
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What do the undead servants do after Gla'aki sinks?
They return to the dig site
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What do investigators plan to do with their prisoners?
Convert them
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When do investigators plan to convert their prisoners?
At nightfall
